news.title: Trump announces 30% tariffs on EU and Mexico
news.summary: President Donald Trump has sent similar letters to 23 other U.S. trading partners this week. The countries include Canada, Japan and Brazil.

news.title: Treasury posts unexpected surplus in June as tariff receipts surge
news.summary: Last month saw a surplus of a little more than $27 billion, following a $316 billion deficit in May. The U.S. posted a $317 billion deficit last month, followed by a deficit of $316.5 billion in April.

news.title: Trump budget chief Vought ramps up criticism of Powell, vows investigation into Fed renovations
news.summary: Office of Management and Budget Director Russell Vought spoke Friday on CNBC's "Squawk Box" Vought: "We're going to have to work together to get things done"

news.title: Google hires Windsurf CEO Varun Mohan, others in $2.4 billion AI talent deal
news.summary: Google wants its AI models to become bigger in coding. It has now hired the CEO of one of the top startups in that area. Google wants to become a bigger player in the field of AI.

news.title: Judge orders Trump administration to halt indiscriminate immigration stops, arrests in California
news.summary: A federal judge on Friday ordered the Trump administration to halt indiscriminate immigration stops and arrests in seven California counties. The seven counties, including Los Angeles, include Los Angeles and San Diego.

news.title: ‘I’m in California and plan to stay here’: I’m 61, lost my job and live off my $425K IRA. My house has $650K in equity. Do I sell?
news.summary: “A very stressful year-long job search yielded less than satisfactory results,” she said. “I’m very happy to be back in the U.S.”

news.title: When my friend was on her deathbed, her parents took $25,000 in cash and won’t give it to her son. Do we tell him?
news.summary: “They are a very religious family. These are the same people who hug the altar every week,” says a friend of the family.

news.title: My partner’s parents offered us a loan to buy a house. What could go wrong?
news.summary: “We are not interested in marrying at the moment and we each have our own assets,” he said. “We each have their own assets.”

news.title: How to keep your kid’s Roblox or Fortnite habit from wrecking your credit-card bill
news.summary: It's too easy for young gamers to see digital payments as “free money.” Here are some tips for talking to kids about finance.

news.title: I’m 70, a widow and struggled financially. How do I let go of the resentment I feel towards my wealthy, unhelpful brother?
news.summary: “I’m now doing better financially than I ever thought I would. My house in Tucson is valued at $416,000.”
